message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested, but $10,000 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now. Would you be willing to come down to $7,500?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $9,000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
